mdRecord.dcterms:description: Original design by Williams and Tazewell, 1972-74; addition designed by Robert A. M. Stern and Marcellus, Wright, Cox and Smith, 1983-84. Structural problems and expanding student population led to demolition, 2004. -- Wilson/Neuman/Butler, University of Virginia campus guide, 2012. [work]
